name: ASP.NET Identity
body:
### Welcome to ASP.NET Identity with NHibernate + FluentNHibernate. I decided migrate the ASP.NET Identity with Entity Framework to NHibernate with FluentNHibernate when I had to use that Membership system with others relational databases (e.g: MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL and others). ### Authors and Contributors In 2015, Fl√°vio Da Maia Jr (@flaviodamaiajr) started the migration of ASP.NET Identity with Entity Framework - EF to ORM NHibernate with FluentNHibernate. ### References http://www.asp.net/identity
https://github.com/aspnet/Identity
https://github.com/nhibernate
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
